name: â˜… Figmagine
description:
An implementation of the game Imagine on Figma.

It's a Pictionnary-like, where players don't have to draw, but assembly abstract forms and figures.
I love this game to stimulate my creativity, and wanted to share it with my friends and the community to play during the quarantine period.

Links with instructions, video presentation and a random words generator are in the file.

All rights to graphic design depicted in this file belong to their creators.

Have fun!
